title: division/amalgamated/plot area is more than 5000 sq
clause_text: division/amalgamated/plot area is more than 5000 sq. m, LOS may be provided in more than one place, but at least one of such places shall be not less than 1000 sq. m in size. Such LOS will not be necessary in the case of land used for educational institutions with attached independent playgrounds.
section: LOS in residential and commercial layouts:
